short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension estimates the reading time of articles/ documentations/ news and display it under the title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES
1. Estimate the reading time across various websites.
2. Support for both English and Chinese websites (most similar extensions lack Chinese support).
3. Toggle the estimation temporarily with the hotkey Ctrl + Shift + 2.
4. Add URLs to a blacklist to prevent the extension from running on those websites permanently.

CHANGE LOG
v1.1.2: increase performance 
v1.1.1: Blacklist input now defaults to the current tab's URL.
v1.1.0: Introduced blacklist feature, allowing users to disable the extension on specific websites.
v1.0.0: Improved compatibility with more websites.

Github link: https://github.com/sam1037/Time2Read-Estimator
